# Session Context
*Created: 2026-01-09*

## Git State
Branch: main

## Test Commands
`uv run pytest test_app.py -k card`

## Codebase Snapshot
Flashcard app project with FastHTML + fastlite for SQLite.

---

# Cognition State
*Updated: 2026-01-09*

## Operational State

Last sequence: 001
Active: none
Recent: 001_data-model_complete.md

## Inherited Knowledge from Task 001

main.py contains:
- Card dataclass with fields: id, front, back, next_review, interval
- db = database('cards.db')
- cards = db.create(Card, pk='id')

This foundation is established. Task 002 builds routes on top of it.

---

Campaign: build the flashcard app per README.md
Task: 002 routes-crud

Description: CRUD routes: /, /cards, /cards/new, /cards/{id}/delete

Delta: /Users/cck/CC/plugins/marketplaces/crinzo-plugins/scratch/anki-v30/main.py, /Users/cck/CC/plugins/marketplaces/crinzo-plugins/scratch/anki-v30/test_app.py

Done when: GET / redirects to /cards; GET /cards lists all cards; GET /cards/new shows form; POST /cards/new creates card and redirects 303; POST /cards/{id}/delete removes card and redirects 303; tests for card creation, listing, deletion pass

Verify: `uv run pytest test_app.py -k card`

Routes to implement:
| Route | Method | Behavior |
|-------|--------|----------|
| `/` | GET | Redirect to `/cards` |
| `/cards` | GET | List all cards with front text |
| `/cards/new` | GET | Form to create new card |
| `/cards/new` | POST | Create card, redirect to `/cards` |
| `/cards/{id}/delete` | POST | Delete card, redirect to `/cards` |

content.text: I'll create the workspace file for this campaign task.

input.content:
# 002: CRUD routes for flashcard app

## Implementation
Path: [HTTP Request] → [Route Handler] → [DB Operation/Template Response] → [HTTP Response]
Delta: /Users/cck/CC/plugins/marketplaces/crinzo-plugins/scratch/anki-v30/main.py, /Users/cck/CC/plugins/marketplaces/crinzo-plugins/scratch/anki-v30/test_app.py
Verify: `uv run pytest test_app.py -k card`

## Thinking Traces

Building on task 001, which established:
- Card dataclass with fields: id, front, back, next_review, interval
- db = database('cards.db')
- cards = db.create(Card, pk='id')

Routes to implement:

| Route | Method | Behavior |
|-------|--------|----------|
| `/` | GET | Redirect to `/cards` |
| `/cards` | GET | List all cards with front text |
| `/cards/new` | GET | Form to create new card |
| `/cards/new` | POST | Create card, redirect to `/cards` |
| `/cards/{id}/delete` | POST | Delete card, redirect to `/cards` |

Implementation details:
- Use FastHTML route decorators (@rt)
- POST endpoints must return 303 redirects (per spec)
- Form fields: front, back (both text inputs)
- Card list should display front text of each card
- Initialize new cards with next_review=date.today(), interval=1

Done when: GET / redirects to /cards; GET /cards lists all cards; GET /cards/new shows form; POST /cards/new creates card and redirects 303; POST /cards/{id}/delete removes card and redirects 303; tests for card creation, listing, deletion pass

## Delivered
[filled by builder]

## Key Findings
[filled by synthesizer]
